overview: Kiara Cole has booked Chuck's Air Bnb for the weekend, but there is some confusion about price.  Tony Rubino's landlord is fed up with roommate Destiny Cruz' rent excuses. Tony tries to talk him out of the landlord kicking lovely Destiny out, but then she drops the bomb that she overslept and lost her job!  This guy gets caught between a rock and a hard place when his girlfriend tells him he needs to tell his roommate Dani Lynn to stop walking around nude and playing with her pussy with the door open...  When Chuck sees that beautiful Canadian Paige Owens will be staying at his bed and breakfast, he's beyond excited. Paige comes in at night, so in the morning, Chuck enters her room to collect his fee... and sees her big booty!
tagline: Home Buying & Rental XXX Tales Involving Tiny Girls
title: Petite Properties 4
